title: Borussia Dortmund head coach Niko Kovac signs new contract - The Athletic
snippet: Aug. 26, 2025 ... Borussia Dortmund head coach Niko Kovac has signed a new contract until June 2027.

title: Niko Kovač - Wikipedia
snippet: Kovač signed an 18-month deal with Borussia Dortmund on 29 January 2025. Kovač took charge with the team in 11th place. Under his leadership, Dortmund reached the Champions League quarter-finals, where they were eliminated by Barcelona. On the final matchday, the club climbed to fourth, securing Champions League qualification for the next season.

title: Nuri Şahin succeeds Edin Terzić as Borussia Dortmund head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Nuri Şahin has replaced Edin Terzić as Borussia Dortmund head coach following the latter's surprise resignation.

title: Borussia Dortmund appoint Niko Kovač as new head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Niko Kovač is set to take over as Borussia Dortmund head coach.
